name: grid-js-component
description: A reactjs and vuejs grid component.

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-less && npm run minifier-template && webpack && npm run clean-rev && rev-static
scripts.build-less: lessc src/grid.less > dist/grid.css && cleancss -o dist/grid.min.css dist/grid.css ./node_modules/perfect-scrollbar/dist/css/perfect-scrollbar.css && lessc demo/common.less > demo/common.css
scripts.minifier-template: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --case-sensitive --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace src/vue-grid.template.html -o dist/vue-grid.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --case-sensitive --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace src/angular-grid.template.html -o dist/angular-grid.html

author: York Yao
